attributes.comment:
As a mom of two internationally adopted children I am VERY disappointed to learn
that MY government was raising the fees once again for documents needed to
complete an international adoption. International adoption is a wonderful way
to build a family, but for my government to increase fees by an average of 66%
is appalling. Each time you increase these fees it may mean that a child who
desperately needs a family is unable to come home. I would ask you for the sake
of the children please do not increase these fees!!

Respectfully,
Sarah

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sarah Escalera
